alert.note: Alert for Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Miami; Wabash; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 2:27AM EDT until July 29 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Wabash County in north central Indiana... Grant County in central Indiana... Blackford County in east central Indiana... Southern Huntington County in northeastern Indiana... Southern Wells County in northeastern Indiana... Southern Miami County in north central Indiana... * Until 315 AM EDT. * At 226 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wabash to 11 miles southwest of Kokomo, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marion, Peru, Hartford City, Gas City, Upland, Fairmount, Grissom Afb, Montpelier, Jonesboro, Sweetser, Swayzee, Bunker Hill, La Fontaine, Van Buren, Matthews, Sims, Miami, Converse, Warren, and Amboy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Miami; Wabash; Wells
